title: Swamp paste

properties.value: Swamp paste can be made by mixing flour with swamp tar to make raw swamp paste, and then cooking the mixture on a fire (not a range), giving 2 experience. It is possible to burn the tar resulting in the player discarding the burnt tar. Swamp tar can be found in Lumbridge Swamp and in Mort Myre Swamp.

Item ID1941

Swamp paste can be made by mixing flour with swamp tar to make raw swamp paste, and then cooking the mixture on a fire (not a range), giving 2 experience. It is possible to burn the tar resulting in the player discarding the burnt tar. Swamp tar can be found in Lumbridge Swamp and in Mort Myre Swamp.

Swamp paste can also be bought from the Trader crewmembers at ports such as the one in Catherby, etc., the general store in Port Khazard (south of Ardougne), and Rasolo (west of the Fishing Guild) are very useful for some of the quests listed below. It is also sold at the Mort'ton Builder's Store.

Swamp Paste is used for the following activities:

  • Fixing leaks in Cabin Fever.
  • Repairing the boat in the Sea Slug quest.
  • Repairing the bank in the In Aid of the Myreque quest.
  • The Slug Menace quest.
  • Repairing the leaks in the boat in the Fishing Trawler minigame.
  • Repairing the temple in the Shades of Mort'ton minigame.
  • Dragon Slayer II quest.
  • A potential junk item to provide the dwarf in Mourning's End Part II.

Swamp paste cannot be combined with herbs to form ammunition for a Salamander using the Herblore skill.

[[File:Swamp paste detail.png|left|120px]]
'''Swamp paste''' can be made by mixing [[Pot of flour|flour]] with [[swamp tar]] to make [[raw swamp paste]], and then cooking the mixture on a [[fire]] (not a range), giving 2 [[experience]]. It is possible to burn the tar resulting in the player discarding the burnt tar. Swamp tar can be found in [[Lumbridge Swamp]] and in [[Mort Myre Swamp]].

Swamp paste can also be bought from the [[Trader crewmember]]s at ports such as the one in [[Catherby]], etc., the [[general store]] in [[Port Khazard]] (south of [[Ardougne]]), and [[Rasolo]] (west of the [[Fishing Guild]]) are very useful for some of the [[quests]] listed below. It is also sold at the [[Mort'ton]] [[Razmire Builders Merchants|Builder's Store]].

Swamp Paste is used for the following activities:
*Fixing leaks in [[Cabin Fever]].
*Repairing the boat in the [[Sea Slug]] quest.
*Repairing the bank in the [[In Aid of the Myreque]] quest.
*[[The Slug Menace]] quest.
*Repairing the leaks in the boat in the [[Fishing Trawler]] [[Minigames|minigame]].
*Repairing the temple in the [[Shades of Mort'ton (minigame)|Shades of Mort'ton]] minigame.
*[[Dragon Slayer II]] quest.
*A potential junk item to provide the dwarf in [[Mourning's End Part II]].

Swamp paste cannot be combined with [[herb]]s to form ammunition for a [[Salamander]] using the [[Herblore]] skill.
